channel.title: Comments on: SQL/NoSQL and MySQL Cluster 7.4 Presentations now available
channel.description: Database technologies - especially around scalability and High Availability

item.title: By: andrew
item.dc:creator: andrew
item.content:encoded:
In reply to thangict93.

If you’re wanting to understand what upgrade paths are supported then this is a good starting point… http://dev.mysql.com/doc/refman/5.6/en/mysql-cluster-upgrade-downgrade.html

Andrew.

item.title: By: thangict93

item.description: hello! current, I am using mysql cluster 7.1.18. I want to upgrade version. How much is appropriate? Thanks. Sorry, my english is not good.
item.content:encoded:
hello!
